item.title: Acronyms in tech
item.description:
• ALU
    • Arithmetic Logic Unit
    • An example of 8 bits ALU
      • 2 inputs A (8 bits) and B (8 bits)
      • 1 output (8 bits)
      • 3 flags
        • Overflow
        • Zero
        • Negative
      • Operation code (4bits)
  • CPU
    • Control Process Unit
    • See how a CPU works
    • 3 pharse
      • Fetch
      • Decode
      • Execute
  • RAM
    • Random Access Memory
    • Address
    • Data
      • Operation code
      • Address or register
